attributes.action: New home owners need the Government to intervene in the current leasehold scam.
attributes.background: large building companies in Britain are misselling house's leasehold. They are then selling the freeholds to 3rd party companies for huge profits that can then legally double ground rent every 10 yr (unsellable)  meaning a £160.000 house will have a yearly ground rent of £9445 by 2055. I will be 70?

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do. 

You may wish to sign this petition instead: 

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/183086
